effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
